ViewObject.Name: PromoProdukView
ViewObject.SelectList: PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, TO_CHAR(PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS PPID_CHAR, PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_CATEGORY, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_CATEGORY_DESC, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_CLASS, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_CLASS_DESC, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_BRAND, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_BRAND_DESC, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_EXT, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_EXT_DESC, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_PACK, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_PACK_DESC, PromoProduk.DESCR, PromoProduk.MEKANISME, PromoProduk.AMOUNT_PROMO, PromoProduk.EST_BUDGET_PROP, PromoProduk.REG_CUST_FLAG, (SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PV.VARIANT_DESC) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM PRODUK_VARIANT PV WHERE PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS PRODUCT_VARIANT, (SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PI.ITEM_DESC) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM PRODUK_ITEM PI WHERE PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS PRODUCT_ITEM, PromoProduk.BUDGET_BY, PromoProduk.KODE_POSTING, PromoProduk.VALID_COMB, PromoProduk.ITEM_EXPENSE, PromoProduk.KODE_POSTING_MF, (PromoProduk.PRODUCT_CATEGORY || '.' || PromoProduk.PRODUCT_CLASS || '.' || PromoProduk.PRODUCT_BRAND || '.' || PromoProduk.PRODUCT_EXT || '.' || PromoProduk.PRODUCT_PACK) AS PRODUCT_COMBINATION, PromoProduk.EXCL_CUST_BY, (SELECT CASE WHEN prop.user_type_creator = 'HO' THEN 'APP_CUST_EXCL_' || promoproduk.reg_cust_flag WHEN prop.user_type_creator = 'AREA' THEN 'APP_CUST_EXCL_' || prop.cust_reg_flag ELSE '' END FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID) AS EXCL_CUST_LOV_PARAM, (SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PV.PROD_VARIANT) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM PRODUK_VARIANT PV WHERE PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS PRODUCT_VAR_CODE, (SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PI.PROD_ITEM) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM PRODUK_ITEM PI WHERE PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE, PromoProduk.DISC_MF, PromoProduk.DISC_ON_TOP, PromoProduk.DISC_RASIO_MF, PromoProduk.DISC_RASIO_ON_TOP, PromoProduk.DISC_RASIO_TOTAL AS DISC_RASIO_TOTAL1, (SELECT UCP.USER_CUSTOMER FROM FCS_USER_CUST_PRIV UCP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE UCP.USER_NAME = PROP.CREATED_BY AND PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID) AS USER_CUSTOMER, PromoProduk.BRG_BONUS_MF, PromoProduk.BRG_BONUS_ON_TOP, PromoProduk.BRG_BONUS_RASIO_MF, PromoProduk.BRG_BONUS_RASIO_ON_TOP, PromoProduk.BRG_BONUS_RASIO_TOTAL, PromoProduk.BIA_MF, PromoProduk.BIA_ONTOP, PromoProduk.BIA_RASIO_MF, PromoProduk.BIA_RASIO_TOTAL, PromoProduk.BIA_RASION_ONTOP, (SELECT COUNT(PRODBUDGETBY.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) FROM PROD_BUDGET_BY ProdBudgetBy WHERE PRODBUDGETBY.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS CHECK_BUDGET_DATA, PromoProduk.PRODUCT_APPROVAL, (SELECT PP.DISCOUNT_TYPE FROM PROPOSAL PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID) AS PROPOSAL_TYPE, NVL ((SELECT SUM (NVL (rgr.total, 0)) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_gr rgr WHERE rgr.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.promo_produk_id), 0 ) AS REALISASI_GR, NVL ((SELECT NVL (rgr.total, 0) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_gr rgr, proposal prop WHERE prop.confirm_no|| DECODE (prop.addendum_ke,NULL, '','-' || prop.addendum_ke) = RGR.NO_KONFIRMASI AND prop.proposal_id = promoproduk.proposal_id AND rgr.line_no = TO_CHAR (promoproduk.produk_row_num) AND PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID), 0 ) AS REALISASI_GR_BY_LINE, (SELECT SUM (NVL (rgr.total, 0)) FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY pp.proposal_id ORDER BY pp.promo_produk_id) row_no, pp.* FROM promo_produk pp) prod_real, apps.fcs_view_realisasi_gr rgr, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE prod_real.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.promo_produk_id AND PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID AND prod_real.proposal_id = promoproduk.proposal_id AND prop.confirm_no = rgr.no_konfirmasi_ori AND TO_CHAR (rgr.line_no) = TO_CHAR ( NVL (prod_real.produk_row_num, prod_real.row_no) )) AS REALISASI_GR_TOTAL_BY_LINE, (SELECT CASE WHEN ( prop.discount_type = 'POTONGAN' AND prop.mekanisme_penagihan = 'OFFINVOICE' AND (SELECT COUNT (prdcv.no_pp) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_dcv prdcv WHERE prdcv.no_pp = prop.proposal_no) = 0) THEN CASE WHEN promoproduk.ppid_ref <> 0 THEN promoproduk.disc_mf - (SELECT ppr.disc_mf FROM promo_produk ppr WHERE ppr.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.ppid_ref) ELSE 0 END WHEN ( prop.discount_type = 'PROMOBARANG' AND prop.mekanisme_penagihan = 'OFFINVOICE' AND (SELECT COUNT (prdcv.no_pp) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_dcv prdcv WHERE prdcv.no_pp = prop.proposal_no) = 0) THEN CASE WHEN promoproduk.ppid_ref <> 0 THEN promoproduk.brg_bonus_mf - (SELECT ppr.brg_bonus_mf FROM promo_produk ppr WHERE ppr.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.ppid_ref) ELSE 0 END WHEN prop.discount_type = 'BIAYA' THEN CASE WHEN promoproduk.ppid_ref <> 0 THEN promoproduk.bia_mf - (SELECT ppr.bia_mf FROM promo_produk ppr WHERE ppr.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.ppid_ref) ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID) AS REALISASI_GR_SELISIH_BY_LINE, NVL( (SELECT SUM (NVL (rgr.total, 0)) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_gr rgr, proposal prop WHERE rgr.no_konfirmasi_ori = prop.confirm_no and prop.proposal_id = promoproduk.proposal_id ),0) AS REALISASI_GR_PENGURANG_MF, (SELECT CASE WHEN ( PPLOLD.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND PPLOLD.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' ) THEN (NVL ((SELECT SUM (NVL (RMOD.AMOUNT, 0)) FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_REALISASI_MODIFIER RMOD WHERE PPLOLD.CONFIRM_NO = RMOD.CONFIRM_NO_ORIG AND RMOD.LINE_NO = PPPLOLD.LINE_NO AND RMOD.KET = 'MF'), 0 ) ) ELSE 0 END AS REAL_MOD_MF FROM PROPOSAL PPLOLD, (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY PP.PROPOSAL_ID ORDER BY PP.PROPOSAL_ID, PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS LINE_NO, PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP) PPPLOLD WHERE PPLOLD.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID AND PPPLOLD.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID AND PPPLOLD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS REALISASI_MOD_MF_PREV, (SELECT CASE WHEN ( PPLOLD.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND PPLOLD.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' ) THEN (NVL ((SELECT SUM (NVL (RMOD.AMOUNT, 0)) FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_REALISASI_MODIFIER RMOD WHERE PPLOLD.CONFIRM_NO = RMOD.CONFIRM_NO_ORIG AND RMOD.LINE_NO = PPPLOLD.LINE_NO AND RMOD.KET = 'OT'), 0 ) ) ELSE 0 END AS REAL_MOD_OT FROM PROPOSAL PPLOLD, (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY PP.PROPOSAL_ID ORDER BY PP.PROPOSAL_ID, PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS LINE_NO, PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP) PPPLOLD WHERE PPLOLD.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID AND PPPLOLD.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID AND PPPLOLD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS REALISASI_MOD_ON_TOP_PREV, (SELECT CASE WHEN ( PROP.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND PROP.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' ) THEN (NVL ((SELECT SUM (NVL (RMOD.AMOUNT, 0)) FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_REALISASI_MODIFIER RMOD WHERE PROP.CONFIRM_NO = RMOD.CONFIRM_NO_ORIG AND RMOD.LINE_NO = PROMOPRODUK.PRODUK_ROW_NUM AND RMOD.KET = 'MF'), 0 ) ) ELSE 0 END FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID) AS REALISASI_MOD_MF, (SELECT CASE WHEN ( PROP.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND PROP.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' ) THEN (NVL ((SELECT SUM (NVL (RMOD.AMOUNT, 0)) FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_REALISASI_MODIFIER RMOD WHERE PROP.CONFIRM_NO = RMOD.CONFIRM_NO_ORIG AND RMOD.LINE_NO = PROMOPRODUK.PRODUK_ROW_NUM AND RMOD.KET = 'OT'), 0 ) ) ELSE 0 END FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID) AS REALISASI_MOD_ON_TOP, (SELECT PP.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN FROM PROPOSAL PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID) AS MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN, (SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(PRDCV.NO_PP) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_REALISASI_DCV PRDCV WHERE PRDCV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS DCV_FLAG, PromoProduk.PRODUK_ROW_NUM, PromoProduk.PPID_REF, (SELECT CASE WHEN PP.ADDENDUM_KE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM PROPOSAL PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID) AS PROPOSAL_ADDENDUM, PromoProduk.CLOSE_FLAG, (NVL ( (SELECT SUM (NVL (bb.percentage, 0)) FROM prod_budget_by bb WHERE bb.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.promo_produk_id), 0)) AS BUDGET_PERCENT_TOTAL, NVL( (SELECT SUM (NVL (rgr.total, 0)) FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY pp.proposal_id ORDER BY pp.promo_produk_id) row_no, pp.* FROM promo_produk pp) prod_real, apps.fcs_view_realisasi_gr RGR, proposal prop WHERE prod_real.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.ppid_ref AND prop.proposal_id = prod_real.proposal_id AND prop.confirm_no IS NOT NULL AND rgr.no_konfirmasi_ori = prop.confirm_no ),0) AS REALISASI_PP_GR_TOT_BY_LINE, NVL ( (SELECT SUM (NVL (rdcv.amount_cm, 0)) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_dcv rdcv WHERE rdcv.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.promo_produk_id), 0) AS REALISASI_DCV, NVL ( (SELECT SUM (NVL (DCV.AMOUNT_CM, 0)) FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_REALISASI_DCV DCV, PROPOSAL PPL WHERE PPL.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID AND PPL.CONFIRM_NO = DCV.NO_PC_ORI AND DCV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PPID_REF), 0 ) AS REALISASI_DCV_PENGURANG_MF, (SELECT CASE WHEN (prop.discount_type = 'PROMOBARANG' AND prop.mekanisme_penagihan = 'ONINVOICE') THEN (NVL ( (SELECT SUM (NVL (rpb.total, 0)) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_promobarang rpb WHERE rpb.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.promo_produk_id), 0 )) ELSE 0 END FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID) AS REALISASI_PRM_BRG_BY_LINE, PromoProduk.PAKET_FLAG, (SELECT PP.CREATED_BY FROM PROPOSAL PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID) AS PROPOSAL_CREATOR, PromoProduk.CREATED_BY, (SELECT NVL(SUM(BIAYA_QTY),0) FROM BIAYA BIA WHERE BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS BIAYA_QTY, (SELECT BIAYA_UOM FROM BIAYA BIA WHERE BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND ROWNUM = 1) AS BIAYA_UOM, (SELECT NVL(SUM(BIAYA_PRICE),0) FROM BIAYA BIA WHERE BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS BIAYA_PRICE, (ROWNUM) AS PRODUK_LINE_NUM, PromoProduk.CLOSE_LINE_EBS_DCV, PromoProduk.CLOSE_LINE_EBS_MOD, PromoProduk.CLOSE_LINE_EBS_PB, PromoProduk.CLOSE_LINE_EBS_PR, PromoProduk.CLOSE_REASON

ViewAttribute.Name: ProductName
ProductVariant
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PV.VARIANT_DESC) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM PRODUK_VARIANT PV WHERE PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: ProductItem
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PI.ITEM_DESC) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM PRODUK_ITEM PI WHERE PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: ProductCombination
ViewAttribute.Expression: PromoProduk.PRODUCT_CATEGORY || '.' || PromoProduk.PRODUCT_CLASS || '.' || PromoProduk.PRODUCT_BRAND || '.' || PromoProduk.PRODUCT_EXT || '.' || PromoProduk.PRODUCT_PACK

ViewAttribute.Name: ExclCustLovParam
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT CASE WHEN prop.user_type_creator = 'HO' THEN 'APP_CUST_EXCL_' || promoproduk.reg_cust_flag WHEN prop.user_type_creator = 'AREA' THEN 'APP_CUST_EXCL_' || prop.cust_reg_flag ELSE '' END FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: ProductVarCode
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PV.PROD_VARIANT) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM PRODUK_VARIANT PV WHERE PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: ProductItemCode
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT RTRIM(dbms_lob.substr(REPLACE( REPLACE( XMLAGG( XMLELEMENT("A",PI.PROD_ITEM) ORDER BY 1).getClobVal(), '',''), '',','), 1995, 1 ), ',') FROM PRODUK_ITEM PI WHERE PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID GROUP BY PI.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: UserCustomer
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT UCP.USER_CUSTOMER FROM FCS_USER_CUST_PRIV UCP, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE UCP.USER_NAME = PROP.CREATED_BY AND PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: CheckBudgetData
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT COUNT(PRODBUDGETBY.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) FROM PROD_BUDGET_BY ProdBudgetBy WHERE PRODBUDGETBY.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: ProposalType
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT PP.DISCOUNT_TYPE FROM PROPOSAL PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiGr
ViewAttribute.Expression: NVL ((SELECT SUM (NVL (rgr.total, 0)) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_gr rgr WHERE rgr.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.promo_produk_id), 0 )

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiGrMf
RealisasiGrByLine
ViewAttribute.Expression: NVL ((SELECT NVL (rgr.total, 0) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_gr rgr, proposal prop WHERE prop.confirm_no|| DECODE (prop.addendum_ke,NULL, '','-' || prop.addendum_ke) = RGR.NO_KONFIRMASI AND prop.proposal_id = promoproduk.proposal_id AND rgr.line_no = TO_CHAR (promoproduk.produk_row_num) AND PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID), 0 )

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiGrTotalByLine
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT SUM (NVL (rgr.total, 0)) FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY pp.proposal_id ORDER BY pp.promo_produk_id) row_no, pp.* FROM promo_produk pp) prod_real, apps.fcs_view_realisasi_gr rgr, PROPOSAL PROP WHERE prod_real.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.promo_produk_id AND PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID AND prod_real.proposal_id = promoproduk.proposal_id AND prop.confirm_no = rgr.no_konfirmasi_ori AND TO_CHAR (rgr.line_no) = TO_CHAR ( NVL (prod_real.produk_row_num, prod_real.row_no) ))

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiGrSelisihByLine
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT CASE WHEN ( prop.discount_type = 'POTONGAN' AND prop.mekanisme_penagihan = 'OFFINVOICE' AND (SELECT COUNT (prdcv.no_pp) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_dcv prdcv WHERE prdcv.no_pp = prop.proposal_no) = 0) THEN CASE WHEN promoproduk.ppid_ref <> 0 THEN promoproduk.disc_mf - (SELECT ppr.disc_mf FROM promo_produk ppr WHERE ppr.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.ppid_ref) ELSE 0 END WHEN ( prop.discount_type = 'PROMOBARANG' AND prop.mekanisme_penagihan = 'OFFINVOICE' AND (SELECT COUNT (prdcv.no_pp) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_dcv prdcv WHERE prdcv.no_pp = prop.proposal_no) = 0) THEN CASE WHEN promoproduk.ppid_ref <> 0 THEN promoproduk.brg_bonus_mf - (SELECT ppr.brg_bonus_mf FROM promo_produk ppr WHERE ppr.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.ppid_ref) ELSE 0 END WHEN prop.discount_type = 'BIAYA' THEN CASE WHEN promoproduk.ppid_ref <> 0 THEN promoproduk.bia_mf - (SELECT ppr.bia_mf FROM promo_produk ppr WHERE ppr.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.ppid_ref) ELSE 0 END ELSE 0 END FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiGrMfByLine
RealisasiGrOnTopByLine
RealisasiGrPengurangMf
ViewAttribute.Expression: NVL( (SELECT SUM (NVL (rgr.total, 0)) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_gr rgr, proposal prop WHERE rgr.no_konfirmasi_ori = prop.confirm_no and prop.proposal_id = promoproduk.proposal_id ),0)

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiGrSelisihMfByLine
RealisasiModMfPrev
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT CASE WHEN ( PPLOLD.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND PPLOLD.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' ) THEN (NVL ((SELECT SUM (NVL (RMOD.AMOUNT, 0)) FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_REALISASI_MODIFIER RMOD WHERE PPLOLD.CONFIRM_NO = RMOD.CONFIRM_NO_ORIG AND RMOD.LINE_NO = PPPLOLD.LINE_NO AND RMOD.KET = 'MF'), 0 ) ) ELSE 0 END AS REAL_MOD_MF FROM PROPOSAL PPLOLD, (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY PP.PROPOSAL_ID ORDER BY PP.PROPOSAL_ID, PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS LINE_NO, PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP) PPPLOLD WHERE PPLOLD.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID AND PPPLOLD.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID AND PPPLOLD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROMO_PRODUK_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiModOnTopPrev
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT CASE WHEN ( PPLOLD.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND PPLOLD.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' ) THEN (NVL ((SELECT SUM (NVL (RMOD.AMOUNT, 0)) FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_REALISASI_MODIFIER RMOD WHERE PPLOLD.CONFIRM_NO = RMOD.CONFIRM_NO_ORIG AND RMOD.LINE_NO = PPPLOLD.LINE_NO AND RMOD.KET = 'OT'), 0 ) ) ELSE 0 END AS REAL_MOD_OT FROM PROPOSAL PPLOLD, (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY PP.PROPOSAL_ID ORDER BY PP.PROPOSAL_ID, PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID) AS LINE_NO, PP.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PP.PROPOSAL_ID FROM PROMO_PRODUK PP) PPPLOLD WHERE PPLOLD.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID AND PPPLOLD.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID AND PPPLOLD.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROMO_PRODUK_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiModMf
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT CASE WHEN ( PROP.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND PROP.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' ) THEN (NVL ((SELECT SUM (NVL (RMOD.AMOUNT, 0)) FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_REALISASI_MODIFIER RMOD WHERE PROP.CONFIRM_NO = RMOD.CONFIRM_NO_ORIG AND RMOD.LINE_NO = PROMOPRODUK.PRODUK_ROW_NUM AND RMOD.KET = 'MF'), 0 ) ) ELSE 0 END FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiModOnTop
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT CASE WHEN ( PROP.DISCOUNT_TYPE = 'POTONGAN' AND PROP.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN = 'ONINVOICE' ) THEN (NVL ((SELECT SUM (NVL (RMOD.AMOUNT, 0)) FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_REALISASI_MODIFIER RMOD WHERE PROP.CONFIRM_NO = RMOD.CONFIRM_NO_ORIG AND RMOD.LINE_NO = PROMOPRODUK.PRODUK_ROW_NUM AND RMOD.KET = 'OT'), 0 ) ) ELSE 0 END FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: MekanismePenagihan
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT PP.MEKANISME_PENAGIHAN FROM PROPOSAL PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: DcvFlag
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(PRDCV.NO_PP) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_REALISASI_DCV PRDCV WHERE PRDCV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: ProposalAddendum
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT CASE WHEN PP.ADDENDUM_KE IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM PROPOSAL PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: BudgetPercentTotal
ViewAttribute.Expression: (NVL ( (SELECT SUM (NVL (bb.percentage, 0)) FROM prod_budget_by bb WHERE bb.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.promo_produk_id), 0))

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiPpGrTotByLine
ViewAttribute.Expression: NVL( (SELECT SUM (NVL (rgr.total, 0)) FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER () OVER (PARTITION BY pp.proposal_id ORDER BY pp.promo_produk_id) row_no, pp.* FROM promo_produk pp) prod_real, apps.fcs_view_realisasi_gr RGR, proposal prop WHERE prod_real.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.ppid_ref AND prop.proposal_id = prod_real.proposal_id AND prop.confirm_no IS NOT NULL AND rgr.no_konfirmasi_ori = prop.confirm_no ),0)

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiDcv
ViewAttribute.Expression: NVL ( (SELECT SUM (NVL (rdcv.amount_cm, 0)) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_dcv rdcv WHERE rdcv.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.promo_produk_id), 0)

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiDcvMf
RealisasiDcvPengurangMf
ViewAttribute.Expression: NVL ( (SELECT SUM (NVL (DCV.AMOUNT_CM, 0)) FROM APPS.FCS_VIEW_REALISASI_DCV DCV, PROPOSAL PPL WHERE PPL.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID AND PPL.CONFIRM_NO = DCV.NO_PC_ORI AND DCV.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PPID_REF), 0 )

ViewAttribute.Name: RealisasiDcvSelisihMfByLine
RealisasiPrmBrgByLine
ViewAttribute.Expression: (SELECT CASE WHEN (prop.discount_type = 'PROMOBARANG' AND prop.mekanisme_penagihan = 'ONINVOICE') THEN (NVL ( (SELECT SUM (NVL (rpb.total, 0)) FROM apps.fcs_view_realisasi_promobarang rpb WHERE rpb.promo_produk_id = promoproduk.promo_produk_id), 0 )) ELSE 0 END FROM PROPOSAL PROP WHERE PROP.PROPOSAL_ID = PROMOPRODUK.PROPOSAL_ID)

ViewAttribute.Name: ProposalCreator
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT PP.CREATED_BY FROM PROPOSAL PP WHERE PP.PROPOSAL_ID = PromoProduk.PROPOSAL_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BiayaQty
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT NVL(SUM(BIAYA_QTY),0) FROM BIAYA BIA WHERE BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID

ViewAttribute.Name: BiayaUom
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT BIAYA_UOM FROM BIAYA BIA WHERE BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND ROWNUM = 1

ViewAttribute.Name: BiayaPrice
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT NVL(SUM(BIAYA_PRICE),0) FROM BIAYA BIA WHERE BIA.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = PromoProduk.PROMO_PRODUK_ID
